meanings.sent1: The golfers practiced their swings at the driving range.
meanings.sent2: Many golfers enjoy spending time on the golf course.
meanings.sent3: The golfers tried to hit the ball into the hole, but it bounced back!
meanings.sent4: The golfers navigated the course like skilled sailors on the sea.
meanings.sent5: The group of golfers chatted happily as they walked along the fairway.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of golfers playing on the green.
meanings.sent2: The golfers gathered at the clubhouse after their game.
meanings.sent3: The golfers' colorful outfits made them look like a flock of birds on the course.
meanings.sent4: The golfers moved in unison, like a pack of wolves hunting their prey.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the golfers echoed across the course as they shared stories.
